title: How to Stop Windows Auto Update in 2 Minutes
description: Quick tutorial to turn off automatic updates on Windows. Linked video included.
content:
This step-by-step guide shows you how to disable Windows automatic updates in just two minutes. It’s quick, easy, and safe.

  1. Open Settings.
  2. Go to Update & Security.
  3. Pause updates.
